ai-snp4.6:1.2_0: And even if he were to a hundred years,
ai-snp4.6:1.4_0: and the same message was to be overcome by old age.
ai-snp4.6:2.1_0: look for people who wished for people
ai-snp4.6:3.2_0: A man identifys with a woman,
ai-snp4.6:3.4_0: I revere Him of mine: I revere.
ai-snp4.6:4.1_0: Even if it is while dreaming,
ai-snp4.6:4.2_0: they do not see a man who is wakened.
ai-snp4.6:4.4_0: But it doesn’t see a customs that she has passed away.
ai-snp4.6:6.2_0: They do not give (his) shaking away,
ai-snp4.6:6.3_0: That’s why a sage should possess the possessions.
ai-snp4.6:6.4_0: Having given up safety, they saw the sanctuary.
ai-snp4.6:7.1_0: for a mendicant whose shakes off wickedness,
ai-snp4.6:7.3_0: After the road, for him whom he was setting out.
ai-snp4.6:8.2_0: don’t like or approve of even.
ai-snp4.6:8.4_0: Just as when the rain falls into it,
ai-snp4.6:9.1_0: As a drop with a lotus-leaf,
ai-snp4.6:9.2_0: Like a water-lilies in the sky,
ai-snp4.6:9.3_0: so the sage whose head is not free.
ai-snp4.6:9.4_0: that is to say: be seen or heard;
ai-snp4.6:10.1_0: For a bereft does not identify with that,
ai-snp4.6:10.2_0: that is to say: be seen or heard;
ai-snp4.6:10.3_0: is seeking purity by means of purity.
ai-snp4.6:10.4_0: There is no desire for pleasure,
ai-snp4.6:10.5_0: The sixth Discourse on old age
